name: Spaghetti Carbonara
cooking_method: Boil the spaghetti, fry the bacon, whisk the eggs and parmesan cheese, mix everything together and sprinkle with black pepper.

name: Chicken Tikka Masala
cooking_method: Marinate the chicken in yogurt and spices, grill it and simmer it in a tomato-based sauce with onion, garlic, and ginger.

name: Beef Stroganoff
cooking_method: Saute the beef and mushrooms, add onion and paprika, then stir in sour cream and beef broth and let it simmer until thickened.
